question: Which among the following was the immediate result of the Velvet Revolution of 1989 in Czechoslovakia ?
option1: It ended the authoritative rule & first democratic elections were held
option2: The country was peacefully split into the Czech Republic and Slovakia
option3: Czechoslovakia was turned into a federation of the Czech Socialist Republic and Slovak Socialist Republic
option4: The economy of the country got devastated
answer: It ended the authoritative rule & first democratic elections were held
